Package org.apache.juneau.swaps

Class ByteArraySwap

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.swap.ObjectSwap<T,​java.lang.String>
org.apache.juneau.swap.StringSwap<byte[]>
org.apache.juneau.swaps.ByteArraySwap
Direct Known Subclasses:
ByteArraySwap.Base64, ByteArraySwap.Hex, ByteArraySwap.SpacedHex
public abstract class ByteArraySwap
extends StringSwap<byte[]>
Transforms byte[] arrays to Strings.
